entry.title: New and interesting StoryBoard things
entry.summary:
Last time, we posted about things that were the same. But StoryBoard exists because we needed something a bit different. Here are some of the features new in StoryBoard

This pretty picture

API-first approach

Cats

Worklists

Complex Priority

Boards

entry.title: The Cross-Project Task-Tracker!
entry.summary:
StoryBoard is a task-tracking system designed for cross-project efforts!

Here are some things about it!
